 No you idiot. Cyberwolf has given me permission to take Megaton back 
in time(trans-warptechnology can do that duh it was the whole point 
of beast wars) so that he can attack Stallex when he was a baby and 
barely be saved by Mustex. That way in the future Mustex will have a 
rivalry with Megaton, Veratis his creator, and possibly all the 
mutants. This also explains why Mustex first downloaded his 
Datatracks into Stallex(for a second chance if something should 
happen to him).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Are you doing a flashback right now?
> 
> On 17 Jul 2001, at 21:05, dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> 
> >  Megaton threw Mustex off his back,but quickly realized he was in 
no
> > condition to take on Megatron, or Mustex. He also realized that 
if he
> > returned to his own time for repairs the trans-warp celll that 
brought
> > him here would not have enough power for him to return. So he 
made the
> > only possible choice and ran. He now had 2 enemies in his own 
time he
> > would have to go after. Mustex(and his son),and Megatron would 
both
> > someday feel his wrath, but for now he needed to be repaired.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:

> > out

universe.

> > > > to

> > > > > > > > > enough concealment.

> > > > > > > to

> > > > of 
> > > > > > > energy

hand 
> > and 
> > > > > > scanned

to 
> > > him. 
> > > > > The 
> > > > > > > > scanns did
> > > > > > > > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, 
sap, 
> > > and 
> > > > > mud

> > > > > > > > coated
> > > > > > > > > his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they 
were 
> > > > drawn 
> > > > > > an 
> > > > > > > > hour ago
> > > > > > > > > instead of  years past.

two 
> > > pods 
> > > > > > > weren't 
> > > > > > > > far
> > > > > > > > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and 
went

> > > > > > > > investigate. once

> > > > of 
> > > > > > > things

> > > > monsters 
> > > > > > > tail

> > > > > > > > > the family situation killing the mother (leaving 
the 
> > baby 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > > > fathers DNA to
> > > > > > > > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he

> > > > > > to 
> > > > > > > > the pod
> > > > > > > > > where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots

> > > > > > recognized.
